post.Title: Java desktop links of the week, September 4
post.Content:
It's JavaOne season, and as always the link count drops down as people divert attention to their JavaOne slides. I can't wait to hear how it goes for everyone - sadly I won't be attending this year so I'll be following through the twittersphere :-)

  • I missed a post last week by Gluon talking about 'The JavaFX Hidden Economy'.
  • Dirk Lemmermann has posted about using high res / retina icons in JavaFX applications.
  • Carl Walker has written a 'Great Grid Shootout' between JavaFX and Swing.
